sqlinfo.sql: INSERT INTO jy_storehouse_in ( putin_type, putin_user, putin_date, putin_storehouse_code, contract_no, STATUS, remark, inputuser, crt_date, crt_time, putin_code ) VALUES ( $N{putin_type}, $N{putin_user}, $S{putin_date}, $S{putin_storehouse_code}, $S{contract_no}, $N{status}, $S{remark}, $S{inputuser}, $S{crt_date}, $S{crt_time}, $S{putin_code} )
INSERT INTO jy_storehouse_in_detail ( jy_storehouse_in_id, jy_material_id, putin_number ) VALUES ( $N{jy_storehouse_in_id}, $N{jy_material_id}, $N{putin_number} )

sqlinfo.sqlname: 查询新增入库基本信息的id
sqlinfo.sql: SELECT id FROM jy_storehouse_in WHERE crt_date =$S{crt_date} and crt_time =$S{crt_time}

sqlinfo.sqlname: 查询物资已经对应的物资id
查询所有入库记录的数量
获取入库单对应的入库明细

sqlinfo.sql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT m.putin_type,c.name,c.jy_material_type_id,m.putin_number,c.supplier,c.model,m.putin_date,m.contract_no,m.putin_storehouse_code FROM ( SELECT * FROM jy_storehouse_in a, jy_storehouse_in_detail b WHERE a.id = b.jy_storehouse_in_id or ($ISNULL{contract_no} or a.putin_storehouse_code LIKE '%$U{contract_no}%') or ($ISNULL{contract_no} or a.contract_no LIKE '%$U{contract_no}%') or ($ISNULL{putin_date_start} or a.putin_date >= $S{putin_date_start}) and ($ISNULL{putin_date_end} or a.putin_date <= $S{putin_date_end}) ) m INNER JOIN jy_material c ON c.id = m.jy_material_id WHERE ($ISNULL{contract_no} or c.NAME LIKE '%$U{contract_no}%') OR ($ISNULL{contract_no} or c.supplier LIKE '%$U{contract_no}%') )k,jy_material_type p where k.jy_material_type_id = p.id

SELECT count(jy_material_type_id) num FROM (SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM jy_storehouse_in a, jy_storehouse_in_detail b WHERE a.id = b.jy_storehouse_in_id or ($ISNULL{contract_no} or a.putin_storehouse_code LIKE '%$U{contract_no}%') or ($ISNULL{contract_no} or a.contract_no LIKE '%$U{contract_no}%') or ($ISNULL{putin_date_start} or a.putin_date >= $S{putin_date_start})and($ISNULL{putin_date_end} or a.putin_date <= $S{putin_date_end}) ) m INNER JOIN jy_material c ON c.id = m.jy_material_id WHERE ($ISNULL{contract_no} or c.NAME LIKE '%$U{contract_no}%') OR ($ISNULL{contract_no} or c.supplier LIKE '%$U{contract_no}%') )k,jy_material_type p where k.jy_material_type_id = p.id

sqlinfo.sqlname: 查询入库单对应的物资详情
sqlinfo.sql: SELECT t2.id jy_material_id, t2.`code` code, t2.`name` name, t2.model, t2.supplier, t3.`code` material_type_code, t3.`name` codename, t1.putin_number FROM jy_storehouse_in_detail t1 LEFT JOIN jy_material t2 ON t1.jy_material_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN jy_material_type t3 ON t2.jy_material_type_id = t3.id WHERE t2.id IS NOT NULL AND t1.jy_storehouse_in_id = $U{id}

sqlinfo.sqlname: 查询物资入库统计查询
sqlinfo.sql: SELECT t0.id, t0.putin_type, t0.putin_code, t0.putin_user, u1.`name` putin_user_name, t0.putin_date, t0.putin_storehouse_code, p1.param_name putin_storehouse_name, t0.`status` putinStatus, t1.jy_material_id, t1.putin_number, t2.`code` material_code, t2.`name` material_name, t2.model, t2.supplier, t3.`code` material_type_code, t3.`name` material_type_name FROM jy_storehouse_in t0 LEFT JOIN jy_storehouse_in_detail t1 ON t0.id = t1.jy_storehouse_in_id LEFT JOIN jy_material t2 ON t1.jy_material_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN jy_material_type t3 ON t2.jy_material_type_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN jy_user u1 ON t0.putin_user = u1.id LEFT JOIN jy_params p1 ON t0.putin_storehouse_code = p1.param_code WHERE ( t0.putin_user = $N{sys_user_id} ) and ( $ISNULL{putin_storehouse_code} OR t0.putin_storehouse_code = $S{putin_storehouse_code} ) and ( $ISNULL{putin_user_name} OR u1.name like '%$U{putin_user_name}%' ) and ( $ISNULL{putin_code} OR t0.putin_code = $S{putin_code} ) and ( ( $ISNULL{putin_date_start} or t0.putin_date > $S{putin_date_start} ) and ( $ISNULL{putin_date_end} or t0.putin_date < $S{putin_date_end} ) )
